name: 3. XL overall bonus
description: It is recommended to play the XL map at this difficulty level, which takes effect at 200% difficulty. The experience of computer heroes is 5 times, and the weekly production of urban creatures is 2.5 times.

chinese.name: 3. XL overall bonus
chinese.description: 此难度推荐玩XL图，200%难度下生效，电脑英雄5倍经验，城镇生物2.5倍周产。

author: Nordsoft
